description: A small town in the East Blue controlled by the tyrannical Marine Captain Morgan and his 153rd Branch.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Koby Arrive at Shells Town
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Koby arrive at Shells Town seeking food and information about Roronoa Zoro.
keyEvents.significance: First visit to a Marine-controlled town and the location where Luffy recruits his first crew member.

keyEvents.title: Town's Oppression Revealed
keyEvents.description: The townspeople reveal that Captain Morgan rules the town with an iron fist, and no one dares to oppose him.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the corrupt nature of some Marines and the suffering of innocent civilians.

description: The Marine base in Shells Town commanded by Captain Morgan, where Roronoa Zoro is imprisoned.

keyEvents.title: Zoro Imprisoned at Marine Base
keyEvents.description: Roronoa Zoro is shown tied up in the courtyard of the Marine base, enduring his sentence.
keyEvents.significance: The location of Zoro's first appearance and where Luffy recruits him.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Infiltrates the Base
keyEvents.description: Luffy sneaks into the Marine base to retrieve Zoro's swords from Captain Morgan's office.
keyEvents.significance: First direct confrontation with Marines and establishment of Luffy's willingness to oppose corrupt authority.

statusHistory.reason: Base is operational under Captain Morgan

description: A village in the East Blue where Zoro trained in his childhood with Kuina. Appears in flashback.

keyEvents.title: Zoro's Training Flashback
keyEvents.description: Brief flashback shows young Zoro training with Kuina at a dojo in Shimotsuki Village.
keyEvents.significance: First glimpse of Zoro's past and the origin of his dream.
